alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 05 at 8:06PM PST until January 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph. Localized gusts to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. Strongest winds gust potential will be near the desert foothills. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust and sand could limit visibility at times, creating a hazard for travelers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts
